00090 typedef union {
00091  struct 
00092   {
00093     uint64_t fileid4;

00161 #define FSAL_SET_PCOOKIE_BY_OFFSET( __pfsal_cookie, __cookie )           \
00162 do                                                                       \
00163 {                                                                        \
00164    ((proxyfsal_cookie_t *)__pfsal_cookie)->data = (off_t)__cookie ; \
00165 } while( 0 )
00166 
00167 #define FSAL_SET_OFFSET_BY_PCOOKIE( __pfsal_cookie, __cookie )           \
00168 do                                                                       \
00169 {                                                                        \
00170    __cookie =  ((proxyfsal_cookie_t *)__pfsal_cookie)->data ;       \
00171 } while( 0 )
